snippet: A company that built its brand by deftly copying and expanding on products developed by rivals, Samsung’s recent legal loss to Apple could serve as a bellwether for South Korea’s economy.
abstract: Samsung’s loss in Apple's patent violation lawsuit not only highlights the strengths and weaknesses of the company, but could serve as a bellwether for South Korea’s economy; company built its brand by deftly copying and expanding on electronics products developed by rivals.
lead_paragraph: A company that built its brand by deftly copying and expanding on products developed by rivals, Samsung’s recent legal loss to Apple could serve as a bellwether for South Korea’s economy.

headline.seo: After Verdict, Assessing the Samsung Strategy in South Korea
headline.main: After Verdict, Assessing the Samsung Strategy in South Korea
headline.print_headline: After Verdict, Assessing the Samsung Strategy in South Korea
